messages.subject: Re: a good article on homeschooling
messages.msgSnippet: ... And, it didn t surprise me that they got the part about those hippy alternatives having a hand in the start of homeschooling.  Those hippies don t get
messages.messageBody:
> That was a particularly clear, quick and clean one!
>

And, it didn't surprise me that they got the part about those hippy
alternatives having a hand in the start of homeschooling. Those
hippies don't get enough credit for that! Eugene is somewhat of the
hippy central of Oregon! Well, demographics are changing somewhat, but
still, they host the Country Fair, and that is huge and historically
hippy!

~The first born of real hippies (well they used to be anyway)~Jenny
